name: 光明决 DUEX
description:
DUEX is the first asymmetric competition game of swordsman.

The player chooses one of the five warriors, or one archer of the five guilds to against on the plain.

Features:
• 5 warriors VS 20 archers on 4 x 4 (km) plain
• Asymmetric competition + Battle royale
• Hardcore melee weapon controls
• Rich ranged weapon gameplays
